languages.text: "Сие — прискорбная ошибка. Мы не ждали помощи и не ожидали встретить союзника в чертогах обители. Но я вижу, что вы живы, и скорблю о бессмысленности смерти моих братьев".

"That is a lamentable mistake. We knew of no help that was on its way, and were not expecting to encounter any allies in the monastery's chambers. But I see that you are alive, and I mourn the senseless deaths of my brethren."
languages.original_text: "Сие — прискорбная ошибка. Мы не ждали помощи и не ожидали встретить союзника в чертогах обители. Но я вижу, что вы живы, и скорблю о бессмысленности смерти моих братьев".

"That is a lamentable mistake. We knew of no help that was on its way, and were not expecting to encounter any allies in the monastery's chambers. But I see that you are alive, and I mourn the senseless deaths of my brethren."

languages.text: "Ein bedauernswerter Irrtum. Wir wussten nicht, dass Hilfe kommt, und hatten nicht erwartet, in den Kammern des Klosters Verbündeten zu begegnen. Doch ich sehe, dass Ihr lebt, und ich betrauere den sinnlosen Tod meiner Brüder."
languages.original_text: "That is a lamentable mistake. We knew of no help that was on its way, and were not expecting to encounter any allies in the monastery's chambers. But I see that you are alive, and I mourn the senseless deaths of my brethren."

traits.locale_text: "Ein bedauernswerter Irrtum. Wir wussten nicht, dass Hilfe kommt, und wir nicht erwartet, in den Kammern des Klosters Verbündeten zu begegnen. Doch ich sehe, dass Ihr lebt, und ich betrauere den sinnlosen Tod meiner Brüder."

languages.text: « C'est une regrettable méprise. Nous n'avions pas connaissance de l'arrivée de renforts, et nous ne nous attendions pas à croiser des alliés dans les salles du monastère. Je constate toutefois que vous êtes en vie, alors que je pleure la mort inutile de mes frères. »
languages.original_text: "That is a lamentable mistake. We knew of no help that was on its way, and were not expecting to encounter any allies in the monastery's chambers. But I see that you are alive, and I mourn the senseless deaths of my brethren."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une regrettable méprise. Nous n'avions pas connaissance de l'arrivée de renforts, et nous ne nous attendions pas à croiser des alliés dans les salles du monastère. Je constate toutefois que vous êtes en vie, alors que je pleure la mort inutile de mes frères. »

languages.text: “这真是个令人悲哀的误会。我们并不知道会有援军来，也没想过会在修道院里遇到任何盟友。不过，至少你还活着，我为我的兄弟无谓的死亡而哀悼。”
languages.original_text: "That is a lamentable mistake. We knew of no help that was on its way, and were not expecting to encounter any allies in the monastery's chambers. But I see that you are alive, and I mourn the senseless deaths of my brethren."

traits.locale_text: “这真是个令人悲哀的误会。我们并不知道会有援军来，也没想过会在修道院里遇到任何盟友。不过，至少你还活着，我为我的兄弟无谓的死亡而哀悼。”

languages.text: 「嘆かわしい間違いだ。助けが来るとは知らなかったし、修道院の一室で味方に出会うとも思っていなかった。しかし、私はあなたが生きているのを見ることで、兄弟たちの無意味な死を悼もう」
languages.original_text: "That is a lamentable mistake. We knew of no help that was on its way, and were not expecting to encounter any allies in the monastery's chambers. But I see that you are alive, and I mourn the senseless deaths of my brethren."

traits.locale_text: 「嘆かわしい間違いだ。助けが来るとは知らなかったし、修道院の一室で味方に出会うとも思っていなかった。しかし、私はあなたが生きているのを見て、私の兄弟たちの無意味な死を悼もう」

languages.text: «Es un error lamentable. No sabíamos de ninguna ayuda que estuviera en camino, y no esperábamos encontrar ningún aliado en las cámaras del monasterio. Pero veo que sigue vivo, y lamento las muertes en vano de mis hermanos».
languages.original_text: "That is a lamentable mistake. We knew of no help that was on its way, and were not expecting to encounter any allies in the monastery's chambers. But I see that you are alive, and I mourn the senseless deaths of my brethren."

traits.locale_text: «Es un error lamentable. No sabíamos de ninguna ayuda que estuviera en camino, y no esperábamos encontrar ningún aliado en las cámaras del monasterio. Pero veo que sigue vivo, y lamento las muertes en vano de mis hermanos».

languages.text: "Elem verici bir yanlışlık. Gelmekte olan yardımdan bihaberdik ve manastır odalarında herhangi bir müttefikle karşılaşmayı beklemiyorduk ama görüyorum ki hayattasın ve ben de yoldaşlarımın manasız ölümü nedeniyle yas içindeyim."
languages.original_text: "That is a lamentable mistake. We knew of no help that was on its way, and were not expecting to encounter any allies in the monastery's chambers. But I see that you are alive, and I mourn the senseless deaths of my brethren."

traits.locale_text: "Üzüntü verici bir yanlışlık. Gelmekte olan bir yardım olduğunu bilmiyorduk ve manastır odalarında herhangi bir müttefikle karşılaşmayı beklemiyorduk ama görüyorum ki hayattasın ve ben de yoldaşlarımın manasız ölümü nedeniyle yas içindeyim."
